contents.text: Welcome to Product School in San Francisco, where we offer part-time product management training courses.
To learn about upcoming course schedules and enrollment options, press 1.
To register for a new class, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our registration team.

navigationGoals: Register me for the next part-time product management course in San Francisco.
I want to register for the next part-time product management course.
I want to enroll in the next part-time product management cohort starting this fall.
I’d like help signing up for the next part-time product management course.
I want to enroll in the next part-time product management course.

contents.text: For information on tuition fees and payment plans, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing specialist.

navigationGoals: I need details on tuition costs and available payment plans for the upcoming class.
I’d like details on tuition costs, payment plans, and veteran benefit options.
I need a detailed breakdown of tuition costs and available payment plan options for the upcoming course.
I need information on course fees and setting up a payment plan.
I need information on tuition costs and payment plan options for the upcoming class.

contents.text: If you’re interested in corporate training solutions, press 2.
To speak with a sales representative about group bookings, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our corporate sales team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss group booking options and pricing for a corporate training program.
I’m looking to book product management training for my team and need group pricing.
I’d like to discuss enterprise licensing and group enrollment pricing for a 10-person corporate training session.
I’m calling to arrange group enrollment for corporate training sessions.
I’m looking to secure a group training package for my research team.

contents.text: For support with your current account or technical assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our support staff.

navigationGoals: Help me troubleshoot access to my existing student account.
I need help accessing my account and navigating the online course materials.
I’m experiencing OAuth login issues on the LMS portal and need help resetting my 2FA.
I’m having trouble accessing my account online and need technical assistance.
I need assistance accessing my student account and course materials.
